properties.title: Property Managers
properties.content: Partner with us to expand your property services. Offer laundry services to tenants and earn extra income with commissions on every order.

shopCustomers.title: Shop Customers
shopCustomers.content: We offer easy self-service laundry with washers, dryers, and a loyalty program. Enjoy hassle-free laundry with included detergent, softener, and disinfectant.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.content: We offer professional laundry services for restaurants, ensuring cleanliness and fast turnarounds for your busy establishment.

pickupDelivery.title: Pickup & Delivery
pickupDelivery.content: We pick up, wash, dry, and deliver your laundry. Fast turnaround and convenient scheduling for your busy life. COMING SOON!

introBlock.title: We make laundry easy and quick for everyone
introBlock.subtitle: Whether you're a customer looking for self-service options with great prices through our fidelity club, a property manager wanting to offer laundry services to your tenants, or a restaurant needing clean linens and napkins, we've got you covered. Enjoy reliable solutions that fit your needs, while we handle the hard work.

propertiesCTA.heading: Laundry Services for Property Managers
propertiesCTA.title: Keep Your Properties Running Smooth with Dash & Dry
propertiesCTA.content: Boost tenant happiness and make your job easier with our laundry services. We handle the dirty work, so you can focus on your business and even earn extra money along the way.

restaurantCTA.heading: Laundry Services for Restaurants
restaurantCTA.title: Keep Your Linens Fresh with Dash & Dry
restaurantCTA.content1: Let us deal with the dirty linens and napkins, so you can focus on your chefs and making delicious food.
restaurantCTA.content2: We’ve got the laundry covered while you serve up the magic!

laundryCTA.heading: Pickup & Delivery Laundry Services
laundryCTA.title: Save Time with Dash & Dry's Pickup and Delivery Service
laundryCTA.content: Stop spending hours on laundry. Let us pick up, wash, and deliver your clothes while you focus on what really matters. It’s easy, convenient, and hassle-free.

pricing.heading: Self-Service Laundry Prices
pricing.title: Pricing that Fits Your Needs
pricing.content: We offer competitive pricing on our self-service washers and dryers, with additional savings when using our Fidelity Card.
pricing.feats: Detergent, Fabric softener, ActiveOzone Mist Technology
